name: join-monster
description: A GraphQL to SQL query execution layer for batch data fetching.

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && babel src --no-comments --out-dir dist --copy-files --ignore README.md
scripts.watch: rm -rf dist && babel src --watch --source-maps true --out-dir dist
scripts.testpg-paging: NODE_ENV=test DB=PG PAGINATE=keyset ava test/pagination/keyset-paging.js && NODE_ENV=test DB=PG PAGINATE=offset ava test/pagination/offset-paging.js
scripts.testoracle-paging: NODE_ENV=test DB=ORACLE PAGINATE=offset ava test/pagination/offset-paging.js && NODE_ENV=test DB=ORACLE PAGINATE=keyset ava test/pagination/keyset-paging.js
scripts.testmysql-paging: NODE_ENV=test DB=MYSQL PAGINATE=offset ava test/pagination/offset-paging.js && NODE_ENV=test DB=MYSQL PAGINATE=keyset ava test/pagination/keyset-paging.js
scripts.jsdoc: babel src/index.js -o temp.js && (jsdoc2md temp.js | sed '/\*\*Kind\*\*:/d' > docs/API.md) && rm temp.js

author: Stem Disintermedia, Inc.
